attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new government database ContactPoint is a gross invasion of privacy and should be withdrawn immediately by the government. ContactPoint is to be a database of the name and address of every child under the age of 18. The database is o be available to around 400,000 care workers, government officers and OTHERS such as childrens charities. This will be open to abuse by others than those listed. I believe this to be a gross invasion of privacy and should be withdrawn as soon as possible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
